title: मराठी हिंदी भाषा विवाद !! #shorts
transcript: Why do you speak in India? This is also a question. Why do you speak in English? If you want to stay in India, you have to speak in Marathi. No one has a father. No one in Delhi has a father. No one in Bihar has a father. Everyone has a father. Every person in India has a father. Everyone has a right to go to the state. If they are doing it, they will not go further. People have taken down the vote within a minute. People have taken down the vote within a minute. How can we take down the vote within a minute? We have taken down the vote within a minute. This was the time when Mr. Bala Thakur had seen his dreams. If he had been a leader of his dreams, then if Mr. Bala Thakur had been there, then the people would have been in the government.

title: Maharashtra Hindi vs Marathi Clash : मराठी नहीं बोलने पर मारपीट, पीड़ित बाबूलाल ने बताया दर्द
transcript: Welcome to Republic of India. I had a shopkeeper who was working from the heart and had hit him. He is not speaking Marathi. We have a shopkeeper, Bablal Chaudhary. Chaudhary, what is the reason for your hit? Sir, Ujjain was working around 10.30 am. He was working from the heart in front of our Jodhpur circuit. A hundred and fifty people were taking out the railings. They were doing some work with some flags. They were working for an hour and a half. Seven or eight people from that shop came to our shop. Four people went to the cash counter. Our cashier had gone to him and stood there. Four people had gone to the breakfast counter. So I had come and stood there. Four people went to the cash counter and asked for a bottle of water. Our cashier said that the bottle was from 10 to 20 people. When they spoke in Hindi, they started saying that whatever is there to do in Maharashtra and to do business in Maharashtra, they started calling them Marathi. Then they started calling them Marathi. They said that if anyone in Maharashtra speaks in Hindi, then they will hit the boss and you. If anyone in Maharashtra is hit, then they will break the shop and burn you with the shop. They were threatening me. I was watching them for a long time and listening to them. But when there were a hundred or so people standing outside, they were doing some work with flags, I thought that whatever they said, I would let them go. I stood silent. After that, the one who was there, who was there, came to the breakfast counter. The one who was there, who was there, gave us a bottle of water. The one who was there said that he knows Marathi. I said that he is from UP and he has not been at work for 7 months. So he does not know Marathi. He told me that who are you? I said that I am the owner of the shop in Jodhpur. He said that you do not know this. I was in the middle of the party. That whatever business is there to do in Maharashtra, then Marathi should come there and Marathi should stay in the shop. And the one who speaks in Hindi, he does not know to stay in the shop. I said that I do not know this. This law has never been passed. I said that the law has never been passed. And we are doing this rally today. I said that I told them that I know this. I told them that I was standing in a relaxed manner. I was talking in the way of friends. So I said that I do not know this. And you tell me and I will know. After that, I said that which state is your shop? So I laughed and said that our shop is in Maharashtra. After that, he said that do one thing. What language is your shop in Maharashtra? So I told him that in Maharashtra, everyone speaks in Maharashtra. So he heard so much and stood in my way. So one person comes, the red one, he hits him on the ear. After that, he comes from here and starts hitting from here. And then three or four people start hitting me. I told him that do not hit me. What is my fault? Sir, please speak calmly. So he did not listen to me. He hit me well. How long did you hit him? I hit him for 10 minutes. And he was also hitting me in front of me. And I was listening to him. Were you trying to save him? Tell him that do not hit him. Because our people were scared of him. Because his elder sister was very religious. There were 100-150 people standing. And our shop had 500 people. But he was scared. He did not have the courage to say that he had made such a mall. How many people were you hitting? We were hitting three or four people. And then the other four people were cursing me. And one person was shooting videos. He was moving with the mobile phone. And he was shooting videos. So you were planning to shoot first? Yes, I was targeting him. Because he was shooting in case counter. He was standing in the side and standing in the side. And one person was pointing at him. He was saying that come here. He was also in my other footwear. He was calling me. He was targeting me. Were you hurt? Yes, I was hurt. He was talking with his mouth open. He was hitting me and my mouth was broken. And then he was hitting my ears. And my ears were broken. I was hearing a sound in my ears. I could not hear anything. And he hit me very well. Did you see the doctor? Yes, I saw the doctor. The doctor had given me a CT scan. He had given me a CT scan. He had also given me a CT scan. He had also given me a CT scan. He had also given me a CT scan. He was not talking in Marathi. He was hitting me. Sir, we have been in business for 25 years. There are 2-3 shops in our road. They are big shops. We are in business in Maharashtra. We believe in Karambhoomi. We also respect the language of Maharashtra. We also respect the culture of Maharashtra. But we are in Karambhoomi. We do not object to Marathi. We respect their culture. But the target they made us. It was a very different target. Because they had kept a language in the side. But their target was to kill us. And they had killed the big shop staff. And after that we had to kill them. After that my business was ruined. And my business was ruined. And the next day when I was shooting the video. They had also viraled it on social media. And they were calling me from all directions. What happened? I said, sir, I am telling this to everyone. I don't know how it happened. I don't know if they are good or bad. I was hurt. I spoke to them. We don't talk about business. Because our business is business. You must be calling from the village, the society, the nation. Because the one who is going to kill you has been taken away. All of them. All of them have been taken away. They have sent all the big people from all over India. And all of them are disturbed. They are saying that there are 100 or 200 people in the day. They are saying that what happened? I said, sir, I am not at fault. They have targeted me. I have two or three big shops. I have been doing business for the past two years. What happened in your mind? They said something. And they said that I am a Marathi. I am educated too. I know Marathi. I used to say that Marathi is Marathi. But they also said that what language is that in the market? I said that all the languages are in the market. After saying that, I was hit. After that, they would close your shop. They would tell you about the business. They were very shocked. What do you want now? We were also scared of them. We did not give them a report for 12 hours. And then they said that they are doing business. We are a decent man. We have come to do business. They did not mean anything. We were sitting quietly. Then the next day at 12 o'clock, I saw a photo of everyone. They called me. I said that I will have to get you an FIR. And I did not make a mistake. I was assured. I got the company and business done. Then I got the FIR done. And the FIR is done. As our business is going on, I am going with them. They are saying that they are all my brothers. They have closed the shop. They have come together. And they are going to be in our business. If we do this, how will we stay in Maharashtra and how will we stay in business? We have our business, our shop, and our property. If we do this, we will not be able to live here. We will have to close the business. The business is saying that we are closed. We will go to their office. We will give our own business. We will ask for protection. We will target the business with their brother. We want justice. We want protection. We have come to do business. We have not come to do anything. What is your family and society doing? The society and the family are saying that we are all in the business. I am not coming to the business. I am thinking that I have brought a big business. And my video has changed. And I am killing myself. In the family and family, I have a family, a relation, I am not working in the business. I am not sitting in the business. I am feeling like this. Will the children be in the business that you killed your father and family? We have a lot of staff. We have a lot of staff. We will go to their office and they will feel that we are in the business. So, the business is very disturbed. What will you ask the police? The police told us to give justice. We have come to do business. Give us protection and give justice. And whatever justice they have done, they have done that. How long did you kill? Sir, I have been killed for 10 minutes. I have been killed for 10-12 minutes. After that, the people who came to kill me after they came, the people who were standing there, the people who came to kill me, they were taken away. After that, they said, do this. They have made a mistake. They said, I apologize. I know that it is not your fault. After that, on the other side, at 8 o'clock, Mr. Rane's call comes. Mr. Rane, our friend also came from the shop. So, he called me and said, I apologize. It is my friend's fault. And our friend took the wrong decision. And he did the wrong thing. I apologize to the people who came to kill me. And you are in the evening, right? Come to my office. I apologize to them. I told Mr. Rane. One thing, sir, in our business shop, there were so many customers. And there were so many staff. The staff killed me. After that, even after you believed me, the whole place was changed. After that, my image was finished. After that, after that, I asked for forgiveness. I said, I will not apologize to them. I will apologize to them. I will apologize to them. I will apologize to them. I will apologize to them. So, you are saying that you are apologizing to the people. Yes, they say that we did the wrong thing. It is not your fault. I said, don't do the wrong thing. But, if you do the wrong thing, you will be punished. I am saying that we have been doing business for 25 years. We have 3-3 shops. They are also very big brands. In the name of Jodhpur shoot, the kids were paying me. And you gave the newspaper that Jodhpur is killing the state. Jodhpur is killing the state. What is our reputation? And after that, I will apologize to them. If they are in your office, they will apologize to me. So, I said, whatever the society will say, we will be saying that we will stop doing business. We will go to the CP to get justice. We will be careful that it should not be like this. And we will not do business with other business. We will go there and give the justice. You can see that they were being killed by the people who were doing the wrong thing. They are saying that we want the new thing. The way I have been with them, we want the new thing. And they have been killing for about 10 minutes. There is a lot of defamation in our society. The family is in the state. We are in the state. We do not understand what to do. But the next step is that we have gone to the police. And we should be given justice. I am Sanik Shasatkar Sharma, from Republic of India. Meera Roor.
